headline: Mondelez (MDLZ) Target Lowered at TD Cowen as 2026 Staples Outlook Turns Cautious
summary: Mondelez International, Inc. (NASDAQ:MDLZ) is included among the 13 Best Consumer Staples Dividend Stocks to Invest in Now. On January 8, TD Cowen analyst Robert Moskow lowered the firm’s price target on Mondelez International, Inc. (NASDAQ:MDLZ) to $62 from $68 and kept a Buy rating on the shares. The move was part of TD Cowen’s […]
